name: NATIONAL MANAGED LONG TERM SUPPORTS AND SERVICES HEALTH PLAN ASSOCIATION
description: National association representing managed long-term supports and services health plans.
govEntities: Centers For Medicare and Medicaid Services (CMS)
sampleDescriptions: Advocate for permanent reauthorization of the SNP program; advocate for future long-term supports and services policy that supports "integration," including greater use of FIDE-SNPs; advocate against
